productName: Memory Sync Round 5 — Prisma Clients, Community Leadership & Digital Operations
overview: Extract facts from Jay's Notion workspace covering Prisma's extended client portfolio (Starfox, EPPI, Prent, SUNLIG, Lima Bintang), JBSBA community leadership, Toastmaster journey, MM2H business opportunity, 151 worker accommodation, Prisma team structure, cafe content strategy, and Notion consulting services. Push atomic memories to Mem0 Cloud (api.mem0.ai). No code changes — purely API operations.
goals: Document all Prisma client projects beyond Teong Hin (Starfox, EPPI, Prent, SUNLIG, Lima Bintang, KCLEGAL)
Capture JBSBA community leadership role and activities
Record Toastmaster public speaking journey timeline
Map MM2H business opportunity and immigration case details
Capture Prisma team structure and daily operations
Each fact is atomic: one subject, one predicate, retrievable via semantic search
